definitions.definition: allow oneself to enjoy the pleasure of.
examples: we indulged in some hot fudge sundaes
synonyms: give free rein to; Moreluxuriate in
lose oneself in "she seldom indulged in sentimentality"

definitions.definition: become involved in (an activity, typically one that is undesirable or disapproved of).
examples: I don't indulge in idle gossip

definitions.definition: allow oneself to enjoy a particular pleasure, especially that of alcohol.
examples: I only indulge on special occasions
synonyms: give oneself a treat; Morego on a spree; informalgo to town
splurge "it's healthy to indulge yourself once in a while"

definitions.definition: satisfy or yield freely to (a desire or interest).
examples: she was able to indulge a growing passion for literature
synonyms: give way to "Seth indulged his passion for vintage stemware"

definitions.definition: allow (someone) to enjoy a desired pleasure.
examples: I spent time indulging myself with secret feasts
synonyms: kill with kindness "she did not indulge her children"
